page.title: 14 ST. MARY PARISH CHURCH
page.content: Each Sunday 70 people including 20 children attend either Holy Communion Service,Matins or Evensong.At{St. Mary {Magdalene,Mitford}10% of villagers attend.In 1984 there were seven weddings,six baptisms and twenty funerals.The parish boundary is about 25 miles round the perimeter.{The {Rector,Reverend David Johnson,}visits each parishioner three times every year.He meets many of them at cricket matches and the local pub,'The Plough'.A Newsletter is published every other month.Old church members who die are not being replaced by young people as property is too expensive.It is the wealthy retired who are filling empty properties. It is the{850th anniversary}of the church this year.{Â£100,000}is being appealed for to allow the church fabric to be put in good order.
